title: SMC_PosInfo_Trf_Mult (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_PosInfo_Trf_Mult : BOOL
Multiplies two transformations described by PosInfo objects.
The combined transformation is that of first applying trfRhs and
then applying trfLhs, that is trfC(x) = (trfLhs Â° trfRhs) (x) = trfLhs(trfRhs(x)).
A transformation is given as an offset + an optional rotation (only
used if orientation convention is not ADDAXES).
Can be used in order to manually transform positions
from one coordinate system (PCS) to the other (MCS),
instead of using G54 and
SMC_NCDecoder
(e.g. for jogging applications).
Given the representation of PCS in MCS-coordinates inside trfLhs
and the desired position in PCS-coordinates inside trfRhs,
trfC will hold the same position in MCS-coordinates.
